issue.title: [fund.ts.v3] LFTSv3 contains extraneous [meta] variable templates that should have been deleted by P09961

discussion.p: The LFTSv3 prospective-working-paper N4758 lists a large number of type trait variable templates in [meta.type.synop] that are duplicates of corresponding ones in C++17. The paper P0996R1 that was meant to rebase the LFTS on C++17 appears to have missed them.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4758.

li.p: Delete from all variable templates starting at is_void_v up to and including is_convertible_v as indicated:
